txt.en: Every day there is something to do during the Spring Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Spring Festival activities for four days!
Sergeant Tom would like to thank you for your continued participation in the Spring Festival.
'You've celebrated for four whole days?! You might be even more excited for this spring than I am!\n\n'Here, have a little reward I set aside just for you!'
\qThere are many rewards that await those who participate in the Spring Festival, and for those that celebrate for many days, the rewards are all the grander!\q
All of Middle-earth celebrates the return of spring in their own way.
Complete 'A Taste of Spring' four times
Every day there is something to do during the Spring Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Spring Festival activities for four days!
